headline: NRG has ‘zero interest’ in speculative new capacity build: CEO
summary: “We are not going to do anything that doesn't meet our unlevered [12-15%] hurdle rate that we've announced, full stop,” said CEO Larry Coben.

headline: NRG Energy Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) reported what executives called a “record year” in 2025 and reaffirmed its 2026 guidance after closing the acquisition of the LS Power portfolio at the end of January.
